youCanWrite.message: You can write feedback on this PREreview of {preprint}.

orcidLogIn.message: We will ask you to log in with your ORCID iD. If you don’t have an iD, you can create one.

whatIsOrcid.message: An <link>ORCID iD</link> is a unique identifier that distinguishes you from everyone with the same or similar name.

carryOnMessage.message: As you’ve already started feedback on this PREreview of {preprint}, we’ll take you to the next step so you can carry on.

publishingSeeShortlyMessage.message: You’ll be able to see your feedback shortly.
